body:
The telemetry key `environment.settings.userPrefs` has some preferences. I think this is the prefs that a user has explicitly changes. We have access to this in filter-expressions as `telemetry.main.environment.settings.userPrefs["app.update.auto"]`. For me, that data is

```
{
  "app.update.auto": false,
  "app.update.enabled": false,
  "browser.cache.disk.capacity": 358400,
  "browser.newtabpage.enhanced": false,
  "browser.startup.page": 3,
  "browser.urlbar.suggest.searches": true,
  "browser.urlbar.userMadeSearchSuggestionsChoice": true,
  "devtools.chrome.enabled": true,
  "devtools.debugger.remote-enabled": true,
  "dom.ipc.processCount": 3,
  "layers.acceleration.disabled": true,
  "layout.css.devPixelsPerPx": "1.5",
  "privacy.donottrackheader.enabled": true,
  "xpinstall.signatures.required": false
}
```

body_html:
The telemetry key environment.settings.userPrefs has some preferences. I think this is the prefs that a user has explicitly changes. We have access to this in filter-expressions as telemetry.main.environment.settings.userPrefs["app.update.auto"]. For me, that data is

{
  "app.update.auto": false,
  "app.update.enabled": false,
  "browser.cache.disk.capacity": 358400,
  "browser.newtabpage.enhanced": false,
  "browser.startup.page": 3,
  "browser.urlbar.suggest.searches": true,
  "browser.urlbar.userMadeSearchSuggestionsChoice": true,
